title: League of legends launcher won't start
body:
Hi, I'm having a problem when starting my launcher.
When i start it, a League of legends logo pops up, and disperses. It blinks like this one more time and that's it. Also the fist time this happened Avast (antivirus) gave some kind of massage that file is corrupt. What should i do now?

Thank you

Edit: **SOLVED**
The solution was found, user Carnage243 wrote this and it helped: 

> [{quoted}](name=Carnage243,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QhXY7HFk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-05T14:22:51.812+0000)
>
> Hey had this issue now just fixed it, right click avast and open virus chest then find the league file that was detected and select it, right click restore and exempt from future scans. Avast just seems to have an issue with one of the new files from the patch

replies.body: Hey had this issue now just fixed it, right click avast and open virus chest then find the league file that was detected and select it, right click restore and exempt from future scans. Avast just seems to have an issue with one of the new files from the patch

Youre a god dude, this is the fix.  u should make a new post, the owner of this thread should say *SOLVED*.  Also how did this happen i wonder?  Also everyone with Avast! is going to have this issue, which may be upwards of half the players!!

Very glad to hear that a solution was found relatively quickly!  

As a reminder to everyone, make sure that League of Legends is whitelisted for your Anti-virus/Firewall.  We do have a [Knowledge Base Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) that talks about this much more in-depth as well.

Good luck on the Rift!
I found it. Had to go to statistics to find the virus chest. Right clicking didn't show it but thanks anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=bubbaduder,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QhXY7HFk,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-05-05T15:31:43.376+0000)
>
> I found it. Had to go to statistics to find the virus chest. Right clicking didn't show it but thanks anyway.

statistics -> component status. thanks!!!
I had the same issue, the antivirus scanner Avast was interfering. After disabling it, the launcher works
no dice, i think its a network thing.  Avast! has never blocked league of legends.  I did try to disable it, nothing.
I'm having the same issue but I'm not seeing a "virus chest" in Avast. I have the free version so maybe that's why I can't find "virus chest".

click on the "Show hidden icons" on your taskbar, next to internet connection( and battery life if you use a laptop), then right click the AVAST! icon, there should be an option to access the virus chest from there.
Im having the same issue.  It was fine yesterday, but not today.
